rev.comment: /* Police violence at Occupy UC Davis */ let not name names until we're very very sure it's appropriate and correct to do so. Also, multiple officess were involved, not just
rev.diff:
Line 35: Line 35:
:"When students covered their eyes with their clothing, police forced open their mouths and pepper-sprayed down their throats. Several of these students were hospitalized. Others are seriously injured. One of them, forty-five minutes after being pepper-sprayed down his throat, was still coughing up blood." <ref>[http://bicyclebarricade.wordpress.com/2011/11/19/open-letter-to-chancellor-linda-p-b-katehi/ "Open Letter to Chancellor Linda P.B. Katehi"]</ref>
:"When students covered their eyes with their clothing, police forced open their mouths and pepper-sprayed down their throats. Several of these students were hospitalized. Others are seriously injured. One of them, forty-five minutes after being pepper-sprayed down his throat, was still coughing up blood." <ref>[http://bicyclebarricade.wordpress.com/2011/11/19/open-letter-to-chancellor-linda-p-b-katehi/ "Open Letter to Chancellor Linda P.B. Katehi"]</ref>
â
According to participants, the officer who used [[pepper spray]] was identified as Lieutenant [[John Pike]] of Davis, CA. <ref>[http://www.huliq.com/10178/video-pepper-spray-aftermath-uc-davis-professor-demands-chancellors-resignation "Video In pepper spray aftermath"]</ref>
